scripts.prepare:dev: npm install && npm run prepare:backend && npm run prepare:frontend && npm run prepare:env
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch --git-tag-version false && cd backend && npm run bump:patch && cd ../frontend && npm run bump:patch
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor --git-tag-version false && cd backend && npm run bump:minor && cd ../frontend && npm run bump:minor
scripts.bump:major: npm version major --git-tag-version false && cd backend && npm run bump:major && cd ../frontend && npm run bump:major
